com.epoch.qBank

Class Topic

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.epoch.qBank.Topic
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AuthorConstants, TopicQSetConstants

    public class Topic
extends Object
implements TopicQSetConstants
    Holds topic information while viewing/editing/adding topic. Topics contain question sets, which contain questions. Scope: loaded by DB layer, used by UI layer (view/edit); created by UI layer, written by DB layer (add). Sessions: QuestionBank.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      int id
      Unique ID number.
      String instructorId
      Login ID of the instructor authoring.
      String name
      Name of the topic, such as "Alkenes".
      List<QSetDescr> qSets
      Descriptions of the question sets in this topic.
      String remarks
      Miscellaneous remarks about the topic.

      • Fields inherited from interface com.epoch.qBank.qBankConstants.TopicQSetConstants

      • Fields inherited from interface com.epoch.constants.AuthorConstants

        MASTER_AUTHOR

      • getQSetDescrs

        public QSetDescr[] getQSetDescrs()
        Gets the descriptions of the question sets in the topic. Assumes the topic has already been initialized in session/QuestionBank.
        Returns:
        array of descriptions of question sets

      • getQSetDescr

        public QSetDescr getQSetDescr(int index)
                       throws ParameterException
        Gets the description of a question set in the topic.
        Parameters:
        index - 1-based serial number of the question set
        Returns:
        description of the question set
        Throws:
        ParameterException - if the serial number is out of range

      • exportTopic

        public String exportTopic(String filename)
                   throws DBException
        Export all question sets in this topic to a zip file.
        Parameters:
        filename - location and name of the file in which the exported questions will be stored
        Returns:
        the name of the zip file
        Throws:
        DBException - if the question sets can't be populated

      • toXML

        public List<String> toXML()
                   throws DBException
        Convert all question sets in this topic to XML.
        Returns:
        list where the first member is XML, remaining are file names of images
        Throws:
        DBException - if the question sets can't be populated

      • importSets

        public String importSets(String zipFilename)
                  throws FileFormatException,
                         ParserException
        Import questions from a zipped file, saving images to disk.
        Parameters:
        zipFilename - name and location of zip file containing the questions
        Returns:
        how the import process went
        Throws:
        FileFormatException - if the XML cannot be parsed
        ParserException - if a node can't be parsed

      • parseXML

        public String parseXML(NodeList nodeList,
                       boolean storeData)
                throws ParserException
        Parse topic XML, saving question sets as new question sets within this topic.
        Parameters:
        nodeList - nodes obtained from the XML
        storeData - whether to store name and remarks in this topic
        Returns:
        how the import process went
        Throws:
        ParserException - if a node can't be parsed or a question set hasn't been chosen
